trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Install-Module
trans-unit.target: Install-Module

trans-unit.source: Install-Module
trans-unit.target: Install-Module

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Downloads one or more modules from an online gallery, and installs them on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 从联机库下载一个或多个模块，并将其安装在本地计算机上。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: NameParameterSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: NameParameterSet （默认值）

trans-unit.source: InputObject
trans-unit.target: InputObject

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Install-Module** cmdlet gets one or more modules that meet specified criteria from an online gallery, verifies that search results are valid modules, and copies module folders to the installation location.
trans-unit.target: **安装模块** cmdlet 获取满足指定的条件的联机库中的一个或多个模块、 验证搜索结果是否有效的模块和模块文件夹复制到安装位置。

trans-unit.source: When no scope is defined, or when the value of the *Scope* parameter is AllUsers, the module is installed to %systemdrive%:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\Modules.
trans-unit.target: 当定义没有作用域时，或者当的值 *范围* 参数为 AllUsers 时，该模块安装到 %systemdrive%:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\Modules。

trans-unit.source: When the value of *Scope* is CurrentUser, the module is installed to $home\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Modules.
trans-unit.target: 时的值 *范围* 为 CurrentUser，模块安装到 $home\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Modules。

trans-unit.source: You can filter your results based on minimum and exact versions of specified modules.
trans-unit.target: 可根据指定模块的最低和确切版本筛选结果。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Find a module and install it
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 找到的模块，并将其安装

trans-unit.source: In this example, modules with a name that starts with MyDSC that are found by Find-Module in the online gallery are installed to the default folder, C:\ProgramFiles\WindowsPowerShell\Modules.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，带有开头 MyDSC 的名称在联机库中找到查找模块的模块安装到默认文件夹，C:\ProgramFiles\WindowsPowerShell\Modules 中。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Install a module by name
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 按名称安装模块

trans-unit.source: In this example, the newest version of the module MyDscModule from the online gallery is installed to the default folder, Program Files.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，模块 MyDscModule 从联机库的最新版本安装到默认文件夹，Program Files 中。

trans-unit.source: If no module named MyDscModule exists, an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在名为 MyDscModule 没有模块，就会出错。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Install a module using its minimum version
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 安装模块，然后使用其最低版本

trans-unit.source: In this example, the most current version of the module ContosoServer is installed that matches the specified minimum version.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，模块 ContosoServer 的最新版本已安装与指定的最低版本。

trans-unit.source: If the most current version of the module is a lower number than 1.0, the command returns errors.
trans-unit.target: 该模块的最新版本是否比 1.0 较小的数字，该命令将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Install a specific version of a module
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 安装特定版本的模块

trans-unit.source: This example installs version 1.1.3 of the module ContosoServer to the Program Files folder.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将模块 ContosoServer 1.1.3 版本安装到 Program Files 文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: If version 1.1.3 is not available, an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果版本 1.1.3 不可用，则会出错。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Install the current version of a module
trans-unit.target: 示例 5︰ 安装模块的当前版本

trans-unit.source: This example installs the newest version of the module ContosoServer to $home\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Modules.
trans-unit.target: 此示例安装到 $home\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Modules 模块 ContosoServer 最新版本。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Forces the installation of modules.
trans-unit.target: 强制安装模块。

trans-unit.source: If a module of the same name and version already exists on the computer, this parameter overwrites the existing module with one of the same name that was found by the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果在计算机上已存在相同名称和版本的模块，此参数将其中一个由该命令找到的相同名称覆盖现有模块。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: {{Fill InputObject Description}}
trans-unit.target: {{填充 InputObject 描述}}

trans-unit.source: -MaximumVersion
trans-unit.target: -MaximumVersion

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum version of a single module to install.
trans-unit.target: 指定要安装的单个模块的最高版本。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add this parameter if you are attempting to install multiple modules.
trans-unit.target: 如果您试图安装多个模块，无法添加此参数。

trans-unit.source: The *MaximumVersion* and the *RequiredVersion* parameters are mutually exclusive; you cannot use both parameters in the same command.
trans-unit.target: *MaximumVersion* 和 *RequiredVersion* 参数是互斥的; 不能在同一命令中使用这两个参数。

trans-unit.source: -MinimumVersion
trans-unit.target: -MinimumVersion

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum version of a single module to install.
trans-unit.target: 指定要安装的单个模块的最低版本。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add this parameter if you are attempting to install multiple modules.
trans-unit.target: 如果您试图安装多个模块，无法添加此参数。

trans-unit.source: The *MinimumVersion* and the *RequiredVersion* parameters are mutually exclusive; you cannot use both parameters in the same command.
trans-unit.target: *MinimumVersion* 和 *RequiredVersion* 参数是互斥的; 不能在同一命令中使用这两个参数。

trans-unit.source: If you are installing multiple modules in a single command, and a specified minimum version for a module is not available for installation, the **Install-Module** command silently continues without installing the unavailable module.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在单个命令中安装多个模块并且模块指定的最小版本不是可供安装， **安装模块** 命令以无提示方式会继续运行而无需安装不可用的模块。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you try to install the ContosoServer module with a minimum version of 2.0, but the latest version of the ContosoServer module is 1.5, the **Install-Module** command does not install the ContosoServer module; it goes to install the next specified module, and Windows PowerShell display errors when the command is finished.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您尝试安装 ContosoServer 模块的最低版本为 2.0，但 ContosoServer 模块的最新版本是 1.5， **安装模块** 命令不会安装 ContosoServer 模块; 若要安装的下一步指定模块和 Windows PowerShell 命令完成时显示错误地显示。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the exact names of modules to install from the online gallery.
trans-unit.target: 指定要从联机库中安装模块的确切的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter supports wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 此参数支持通配符。

trans-unit.source: If wildcard characters are not specified, only modules that exactly match the specified names are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定通配符，则返回与指定的名称完全匹配的模块。

trans-unit.source: If no matches are found, and you have not used any wildcard characters, the command returns an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到匹配的并且您未使用任何通配符，则该命令将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If you use wildcard characters, but do not find matching results, no error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用通配符，但未找到匹配的结果，则不返回任何错误。

trans-unit.source: -Repository
trans-unit.target: -存储库

trans-unit.source: Specifies the friendly name of a repository that has been registered by running Register-PSRepository.
trans-unit.target: 指定通过运行寄存器 PSRepository 已注册的存储库的友好名称。

trans-unit.source: -RequiredVersion
trans-unit.target: -RequiredVersion

trans-unit.source: Specifies the exact version of a single module to install.
trans-unit.target: 指定要安装的单个模块的确切版本。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add this parameter if you are attempting to install multiple modules.
trans-unit.target: 如果您试图安装多个模块，无法添加此参数。

trans-unit.source: The *MinimumVersion* and the *RequiredVersion* parameters are mutually exclusive; you cannot use both parameters in the same command.
trans-unit.target: *MinimumVersion* 和 *RequiredVersion* 参数是互斥的; 不能在同一命令中使用这两个参数。

trans-unit.source: -Scope
trans-unit.target: 作用域

trans-unit.source: Specifies the installation scope of the module.
trans-unit.target: 指定模块的安装范围。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are: AllUsers and CurrentUser.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可接受的值是：AllUsers 和 CurrentUser。

trans-unit.source: The AllUsers scope lets modules be installed in a location that is accessible to all users of the computer, that is, %systemdrive%:\ProgramFiles\WindowsPowerShell\Modules.
trans-unit.target: AllUsers 作用域允许在所有计算机，即 %systemdrive%:\programfiles\windowspowershell\modules 的用户可以访问的位置中安装模块。

trans-unit.source: The CurrentUser scope lets modules be installed only to $home\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Modules, so that the module is available only to the current user.
trans-unit.target: CurrentUser 作用域用于只对 $home\Documents\WindowsPowerShell\Modules 安装的模块，以便该模块是仅供当前用户。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: PSGetItemInfo
trans-unit.target: PSGetItemInfo

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet runs on Windows PowerShell 3.0 or later releases of Windows PowerShell, on Windows 7 or Windows 2008 R2 and later releases of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 或更高版本的 Windows PowerShell、Windows 7 或 Windows 2008 R2 及 Windows 的更高版本上运行。

trans-unit.source: If an installed module cannot be imported (that is, if it does not have a .psm1, .psd1, or .dll of the same name within the folder), installation fails unless you add the *Force* parameter to your command.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法导入已安装的模块，（即，如果它没有.psm1、.psd1、 或.dll 的名称相同的文件夹中），除非添加了，安装将失败 *强制* 到您的命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: If a version of the module on the computer matches the value specified for the *Name* parameter, and you have not added the *MinimumVersion* or *RequiredVersion* parameter, **Install-Module** silently continues without installing that module.
trans-unit.target: 如果计算机上的模块的版本与指定的值相匹配 *名称* 参数，并且你不添加 *MinimumVersion* 或 *RequiredVersion* 参数， **安装模块** 以无提示方式继续进行而不安装该模块。

trans-unit.source: If the *MinimumVersion* or *RequiredVersion* parameters are specified, and the existing module does not match the values in that parameter, then an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 *MinimumVersion* 或 *RequiredVersion* 指定参数，并已有的模块与中该参数的值不匹配，然后就会出错。

trans-unit.source: To be more specific: if the version of the currently-installed module is either lower than the value of the *MinimumVersion* parameter, or not equal to the value of the *RequiredVersion* parameter, an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 要更具体︰ 如果当前已安装模块的版本低于的值 *MinimumVersion* 参数，或不等于的值 *RequiredVersion* 参数，则会出错。

trans-unit.source: If the version of the installed module is greater than the value of the *MinimumVersion* parameter, or equal to the value of the *RequiredVersion* parameter, **Install-Module** silently continues without installing that module.
trans-unit.target: 如果已安装模块的版本高于的值 *MinimumVersion* 参数或等于的值 *RequiredVersion* 参数， **安装模块** 以无提示方式继续进行而不安装该模块。

trans-unit.source: **Install-Module** returns an error if no module exists in the online gallery that matches the specified name.
trans-unit.target: **安装模块** 返回错误，如果没有模块存在于联机库的指定的名称相匹配。

trans-unit.source: To install multiple modules, specify an array of the module names, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 若要安装多个模块，指定模块名称的一个数组（用逗号分隔）。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add *MinimumVersion* or *RequiredVersion* if you specify multiple module names.
trans-unit.target: 您不能添加 *MinimumVersion* 或 *RequiredVersion* 如果指定多个模块名称。

trans-unit.source: By default, modules are installed to the Program Files folder, to prevent confusion when you are installing Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) resources.You can pipe multiple **PSGetItemInfo** objects to **Install-Module**; this is another way of specifying multiple modules to install in a single command.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，模块安装到 Program Files 文件夹中，为避免混淆，当你在安装 Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) 资源中。您可以通过管道传递多个 **PSGetItemInfo** 对象添加到 **安装模块**; 这是另一种方法指定多个模块的安装在单个命令。

trans-unit.source: To help prevent running modules that contain malicious code, installed modules are not automatically imported by installation.
trans-unit.target: 为防止运行包含恶意代码的模块，不会通过安装自动导入已安装的模块。

trans-unit.source: As a security best practice, evaluate module code before running any cmdlets or functions in a module for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 安全性最佳的做法是首次在模块中运行任何 cmdlet 或函数前，先评估模块代码。
